verses.text: Manhxo jantacoc ix in tzalaj yet' eb' ix alan t'ayin icha tik: Conh t'a stemplo Jehová, xchi eb'.
Axo ticnaic ay onhxo ek' t'a yol chonhab' Jerusalén tik.
Ha Jerusalén, junnhej chonhab'il yaj sb'oi.
Ha t'a jun chonhab' tik sja junjun macanhil eb' schonhab' Jehová, yic wach' sb'itaj icha yutejnac yalancan t'a eb' co mam quicham.
Ha t'a jun chonhab' tik ay juntzanh despacho b'aj sch'olb'itaj eb' anima yuj yinhtilal vinhaj David t'a stojolal.
k'anec to syak' junk'olal Dios t'a Jerusalén. Junk'olalocab' yaj eb' xajanan jun chonhab' tik.
Ayokab' junk'olal t'a yol smuroal yet' t'a yol spat sreyal jun chonhab' tik, xe chi.
Yuj svach'iloc eb' in k'ab' voc yet' eb' vetchonhab', yuj chi' svala': Ayokab' junk'olal, xin chi.
Yujto xajan scajnub' Jehová co Diosal vuuj, yuj chi' ol vak' vip in sayanek' tas tz'och svach'iloc Jerusalén tik.
